title: pAda sannidhi nAku
sahitya:
pAdasannidhi nAku yenADu galgunO budhajanAvanA sitAramaNA (nI)


anupallavi

  karuNAkara nI karuNamE lEdaitE maraNamEnAkU sharaNamanTI nayyO


caraNam    mATalADumA inka kOpamA tATakArI nannu brova bhAramA
rAmA vinumA idi nIku taramA bhAmamaNi sItA prEmAmbudhi sOmA
(madhyamakAla)
mamapApa vidAraka sogasuga mAruti dhyAninche (raghu) nAyaka 
ripumAraka sadAshivakavi bhava hAraka natajanapAlaka nI
